thread.title: Kamal Haasan to unveil SPB's father's statue
thread.title_full: Kamal Haasan to unveil SPB's father's statue - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kamal Haasan to unveil SPB's father's statue
text: Legendary actor Kamal Haasan will be unveiling the statue of popular playback singer SP Balasubramanyam's father SP Sambamurthy, on 3rd October in Balu's hometown Nellore. Several dignitaries from the film and political worlds like union minister M Venkaiah Naidu, stalwart director K Vishwanath, state minister P Narayana etc will be gracing the event. SP Sambamurthy was a noted Harikatha exponent and he also acted in several stage plays. Apart from the statue unveiling ceremony, a Swachh Bharat cleanliness drive and a Swachh Bharat Musical program will also be organised coinciding with the event.
